sentence.Network_en: These large institutions make — and change—the rules to suit themselves.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些大机构总是随意制定规定，而且说变就变。

sentence.Network_en: People will work themselves up into a state about anything.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们总会沉不住气，为任何事感到担忧。

sentence.Network_en: In many respects Asian women see themselves as equal to their men.
sentence.Network_cn: 在很多方面，亚洲女性都认为自己和丈夫是平等的。

jx.jx_cn_mean: 见be 条 be oneself, not be oneself

phrase.cizu_name: Take care of the pence, and the pounds will take care of themselves.

entry.tran: 他们自己;她们自己;它们自己
entry.def: You use themselves to refer to people, animals, or things when the object of a verb or preposition refers to the same people or things as the subject of the verb.

example.ex: They all seemed to be enjoying themselves...
example.tran: 他们好像玩得都很开心。

entry.tran: 他们自己，她们自己，它们自己(强调所指的人或物，有时用作动词或介词宾语，代替 them)
entry.def: You use themselves to emphasize the people or things that you are referring to. Themselves is also sometimes used instead of 'them' as the object of a verb or preposition.

example.ex: Many mentally ill people are themselves unhappy about the idea of community care...
example.tran: 许多精神病患者本身不喜欢社区护理。
城市自身在日新月异地变化。

entry.tran: (用以代替himself or herself，指代句子的主语，而不指明是男是女;有人认为这种用法不对)
entry.def: You use themselves instead of 'himself or herself' to refer back to the person who is the subject of sentence without saying whether it is a man or a woman. Some people think this use is incorrect.

example.ex: What can a patient with emphysema do to help themselves?...
example.tran: 肺气肿病人能做些什么来帮助自己恢复健康？

example.ex: Nobody was prepared to commit themselves.

entry.tran: (用以代替 himself or herself，强调所指代的人，但是不指明是男是女; themselves 有时也用作动词或介词的宾语;有人认为这种用法不对)
entry.def: You use themselves instead of 'himself or herself' to emphasize the person you are referring to without saying whether it is a man or a woman. Themselves is also sometimes used as the object of a verb or preposition. Some people think this use is incorrect.

example.ex: Each student makes only one item themselves...
example.tran: 每个学生自己只做一项。

example.ex: After all, what more can anyone be than themselves?
example.tran: 毕竟，人们除了做自己又能怎样呢？

auth_sentence.content: Except for the band members themselves, of course.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Except for the band members themselves, of course.

auth_sentence.content: Why can't viewers and listeners see for themselves?
auth_sentence.res_content: Why can't viewers and listeners see for themselves?

Sentence.sentence: Prepare themselves for different job options.
Hotel owners found themselves with a huge number of empty rooms even as a lot of unnecessary new hotels were ready to open.
They focus too much attention on themselves.

sentences.en: You had better ask the students themselves.
sentences.cn: 你最好问问那些学生本人。

jushi.english: You had better ask the students themselves.
jushi.chinese: 你最好问问那些学生本人。

jushi.english: They washed themselves in the river.
They decided to go there themselves.
jushi.chinese: 他们决定亲自到那里去。
